item.title: Research
item.description: Work in Progress “Migration Opportunities and the Impact of Wartime Civilian Protests” presented at ISA 2024. “Do Ceasefires Quench or Fuel Violence in Competitive Conflict Networks?” “Political Territoriality and Urban Violence in Postwar Abidjan” [with Sebastian van Ballen]. Publications “The urban-rural divide in police trust: insights from Kenya”. In Policing and Society. With Emma Elfversson and Kristine HÃ¶glund. “Resentment, status dissatisfaction, and the emotional underpinnings of Japanese security policy.” International Relations of the Asia-Pacific (2022).
